greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A082893(n)-A000040(n), that is difference of n-th prime and number closest to it and divisible by n.
comment: n=9:p(9)=23 is between 18 and 27, closer to 27, so a(9)=27-23=+4.
formula: a(n)=p[n]-n*floor[(floor(n/2)+p[n])/n], where p[n] is the n-th prime.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 22 2003
